title: How to View What Accounts You Have Muted on Instagram

steps.title: Launch the Instagram app on your Android, iPhone, or iPad.
steps.content: Launch the Instagram app on your Android, iPhone, or iPad. It’s the purple, pink, and orange icon with a white camera inside. Log in to your account, if you haven't done so.

steps.title: Tap on your profile icon at the bottom-right corner.
steps.content: Tap on your profile icon at the bottom-right corner. This takes you to your profile.

steps.title: The three-line menu is at the top-right corner ≡.
steps.content: The three-line menu is at the top-right corner ≡ . The menu panel will appear.

steps.title: Select Settings at the top of your menu.
steps.content: Select Settings at the top of your menu. Your Instagram settings will expand.

steps.title: You will see Privacy near the top of the menu.
steps.content: You will see Privacy near the top of the menu. Another menu will expand.

steps.title: Muted Acounts
steps.content: Muted Acounts is near the bottom of the menu. A list of users you have muted on Instagram will show up on your screen. If you want to change your mute settings, tap on an account and go to their profile.
